member.name: T:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger
member.summary: Creates and manages the DebugLogger object.
member.remarks: The DebugLogger logs to System.Diagnostics.Debug.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Trace(System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: Parameters to be injected into the formatted message.
member.remarks: A Trace message just shows the execution path. This log level shouldn't be used in production environment.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Debug(System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: Parameters to be injected into the formatted message.
member.remarks: A Debug message reports successful processing or shows key variable values. This log level shouldn't be used in production environment.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Info(System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: Parameters to be injected into the formatted message.
member.remarks: An information message is used to report harmless events like program start and stop. This log level is part of normal program log and can be used in production environment.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Warn(System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: Parameters to be injected into the formatted message.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Error(System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: Parameters to be injected into the formatted message.
member.remarks: An Error message logs a serious error condition: an Exception or some essential program action didn't succeed.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Error(System.Exception)
member.remarks: An Error message logs a serious error condition: an Exception or some essential program action didn't succeed.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Fatal(System.String,System.Object[])
member.param: Parameters to be injected into the formatted message.
member.remarks: A Fatal message is issued just before the program execution stops. The error makes impossible to the program to do what it was supposed to do.

member.name: M:MvvmFx.Logging.DebugLogger.Fatal(System.Exception)
member.remarks: A Fatal message is issued just before the program execution stops. The error makes impossible to the program to do what it was supposed to do.

member.name: T:MvvmFx.Logging.NullLogger
member.summary: Creates and manages the NullLogger object.
member.remarks: The NullLogger discards all the logs.
